cell module

class cell.Cell(state='NORMAL', clone=0, fitness=1, mutation_rate=0.001)

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class that represent cell individual.

Parameters

  • state (str) – Indicate the medical state of the cell; “NORMAL” or “CANCEROUS”, defaults to “NORMAL”

  • clone (int) – The type of clone the cell belongs to, defaults to 0

  • fitness (double) – Describes the capacity of a cell to successful reproduce itself by natural selection, defaults to 1

  • mutation_rate (double) – Mutation rate of giving birth of a new type of clone mutant, defaults to 0.001

mutate(new_clone_id)

Mutate a selected cell to another type of clone, with new fitness and mutation_rate drawn at random.

Parameters

new_clone_id (int, optional) – New type of clone the mutated cell will belong to

next_ID = 0

Parameter that counts the number of cells and which is used to set the ID for the next created cell.

treatment(alpha)
